document_data.spouses: Unknown Shoukyn man (widow)While listed as a heir to the Phaerdinzer clan, she is listed with "Shoukyn" after her name. This article is written under the interpretation that her maiden name is Phaerdinzer, as she is stated to be the heir of the clan, and a single woman, rather than having married into the Phaerdinzers. Thus, she is assumed to be Phaerdinzer by blood, with Shoukyn being the name of her late husbands clan.
document_data.mainbody:
Dartabba Shoukyn was a member of the Phaerdinzer clan and the most likely heir to the clan as of .
Dartabba did a number of different jobs while raising her children, amongst which she counted the tailoring of dresses through magic she used her powers to convert a dress into five or six different ones for the ladies of her local high society. She also danced quite well, and performed as an escort for many men, the wives of some of which had also hired her for their clothes.
As of , she was a widow whose husband had been "a reckless warrior" and the last of his clan. She was the natural successor to leadership of hers. Shed also raised their six children alone, and per some characterizations, "on nothing at all".
